title: Game Progress Route
content:
ric Thorm. He welcomes you to Baldur's Gate and calls it 'his city' You will now get the following options to respond:

This city will never be yours. A pleasure to meet you. Could we talk face-to-face? I'm going to find you, and I'm going to kill you. Attack.

If you choose the first one, he replies that it's already his but continues to invite you to go inside and see the city for yourself. He formally invites you to his inauguration which will take place in the ceremonial hall. Now that you h
